Open Source Audio Library Project Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
aflib_format
aflibAifcFileDerived class to read and write AIFC audio files
aflibAiffFileDerived class to read and write AIFF audio files
aflibAudioMain base class for all audio objects to be placed in a chain
aflibAudioBWFilterAudio Butterworth filter class
aflibAudioConstantSrcInserts a constant audio source in a chain for test purposes
aflibAudioEditProvides functionality for audio editing
aflibAudioFileWrapper class that allows aflibFile object to be used in a chain
aflibAudioMemoryInputProvides ability to insert raw audio data into audio chain
aflibAudioMixerAudio Mixing class
aflibAudioPitchControls the pitch of an audio source
aflibAudioRecorderAudio timer recording class
aflibAudioSampleRateCvtAllows the aflibConverter class to be used in an audio chain
aflibAudioSpectrumAudio spectrum display and power meter class
aflibAudioStereoToMonoImplements mixing a stereo or mono signal to a mono signal
aflibAuFileDerived class to read and write AU audio files
aflibBladeFileDerived class to write MP3 audio files using the Blade encoder
aflibBufferDevClass that implements a buffer for devices that need one
aflibBufferUtilsClass that implements a buffer for devices that need one
aflibChainBase class that implements chaining for audio objects
aflibChainNodeData class used by aflibChain base class
aflibConfigAudio data configuration
aflibConverterProvides sample rate conversion
aflibDataMain data class for a segment of audio data
aflibDateTimeDate Time class
aflibDebug
aflibDevFileDerived class to read and write to a Linux audio device
aflibEditClipData class used by aflibAudioEdit
aflibEnvFileManages settings for each individual of a program
aflibFFTPerforms a forward or reverse FFT
aflibFileBase class for audio file/device reading and writing
aflibFileItemData class used internally by library for file module support
aflibLameFileDerived class to write MP3 audio files using the Lame encoder
aflibMemCacheBase class that implements audio data caching
aflibMemNodeData class used by aflibMemCache class
aflibMixerItemData class used by aflibAudioMixer class
aflibMpg123FileDerived class to read MP3 audio files using the mpg decoder
aflibMpgFileDerived class to read MP3 audio files
aflibOggFileDerived class to read Ogg Vorbis audio files
aflibRecorderItemData class used by class aflibAudioRecorder
aflibSampleData
aflibSolarisSparcDevFileDerived class to read and write to a Solaris Sparc audio device
aflibWavFileDerived class to read and write WAVE audio files
